title: Snapsnob
author: Nurmukhamed
excerpt: Snapsnob is a simple iOS app that helps you clean up your photo gallery. Swipe right to keep, left to delete, and double tap to add to favorites. Photos stay on your device - fast, private, and easy to use.
text: Snapsnob is a simple iOS app that helps you clean up your photo gallery. Swipe right to keep, left to delete, and double tap to add to favorites. Photos stay on your device - fast, private, and easy to use.
